sub_title: Organisational Psychologist | Director Nolost, People Driven Partner for Better Results | Feeling Good, Working Better.
summary:
Inspired by my life partner who overcame cancer, I have a dream to improve the quality of life of more than a million people by unleashing a human revolution.

I have used my broad scientific knowledge to grow into an experienced expert and drs. in corporate culture and behavioral change to increase the engagement and productivity in the workplace, resulting in more (work) happiness and a higher return!

I worked for KLM, KPN, EY, Jumbo, Randstad, Coca-Cola, CZ, Transavia, DHL, Shell, Holland Casino, Unique, Efteling, Capgemini, Gemeente Rotterdam, Zeeman, Driscoll's, Rituals, Hutten, Essent, Rabobank, Miele, Bosch, VDL, Leonardo Hotels, PWN, TNO, GGZ, DSB, Van Oers and healthcare institutions such as Meander MC, DIAK, ASZ, Isala, Spaarne, Vitalis & Witte Kruis: I have assisted these organizations to keep up with change by establishing a successful culture and to stimulate social innovation. 

How? I have built up my knowledge and experience as: 
- High-end business coach: executive consultant and coach
- ‘The culture guru’ or ‘the happiness manager’
- Board member Leader of Life Foundation
- Board member of Quality of Life Development
- Strategic Director Nolost: as a high-end research and consultancy firm, we increase happiness, health and drive in the workplace, which results in higher engagement & productivity
- Registered teacher (CRKBO), trainer of lectures and master classes
- Writer and speaker
- Honored HR Expert in the top 100 HR experts (2014; The New York Times & Forbes) 
- Accredited expert in sustainable employability and social innovation by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Employment
- PhD candidate and active researcher: from PhD research and research in Silicon Valley to the HR secrets of the most successful organizations in the world (Apple, Google, Facebook & Tesla) to current research at numerous organizations from Nolost

I enjoy working by combining my passion for science, data and organisational psychology, while combining this with my human approach, my humor and creativity. Customers often tell me that they are grateful for my thorough knowledge, positive energy, sharp vision and surprising perspectives. 

Do I have a hold of wisdom? No ;-) I am very experienced and passionate about inspiring and enriching people and organizations and I like to share examples of success cultures as well as challenges in the field of culture, behavior and leadership.

And personally? I am Swiss, ex-top athlete and a proud father!

Can I help you or your organization with anything? 
Please take a look at nolost.nl or send me a message!

profile_positions.description:
Feeling Good. Working Better. We are convinced that people are and will remain the most valuable capital of organizations. People who feel good, perform better! As a high-end research & consultancy firm we increase the happiness, health and motivation on the workfloor. This makes Nolost the strategic partner of people-centric organizations.

We are an energetic, engaged and personal team of analysts and consultants, who bridge the gap between what science knows and organizations do; within the field of organizational psychology. This is how we analyze organizational behavior and -data and help  with implementing the right interventions to increase the employability of your employees.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Director, Business Coach; Culture Expert; Organisational Behaviour & Leadership

profile_positions.description:
Our mission is to improve the quality of life of people. We believe the profit of organisations will increase when employees and customers are happier. 
Return on Human Capital by quality of life development.

profile_positions.description:
Our Vision: 
The suburban population in Brazil, especially women and little children, have limited opportunities to improve their quality of life. The main cause is a lack of access to employability and education. Besides that they are confronted with a lack of safety and health care. 
Our Mission: 
Contribute to the cultural, social, political and personal development of women, children and youngsters who live in this community.
profile_positions.title: Board Member and Founder; Responsible for Strategy, HR and PR

profile_positions.description:
Masterclass Organisational Behaviour
Masterclass Safety Behaviour
profile_positions.title: Teacher

profile_positions.description:
Team member to guide ca. 250 persons at "DSB Bank in faillisement" to strengthen their employability.
Working with e.g. The Wave® to measure work competencies, overall measures of performance and potential, differences between Talent and Motive, and person-organization fit.
profile_positions.title: Mobility Behaviour Mentor at "DSB Bank in faillisement"

profile_positions.description:
Scientific Research in Social- and Clinical Psychology.
Studying, understanding, helping, guiding: Tilburg University aims to use its research to contribute to a better understanding of complex social issues. Researchers do so by looking at underlying structures, links and meanings. The research conducted on Tilburg University's campus leads to new insights and questions, but also to practical advice and recommendations.
Onderzoeken, begrijpen, meedenken, sturen. De Universiteit van Tilburg wil met haar onderzoek bijdragen aan een beter begrip van complexe maatschappelijke vraagstukken. Dat doen de onderzoekers door te kijken naar onderliggende structuren, verbanden en betekenissen. Het onderzoek op de Tilburgse campus leidt tot nieuwe inzichten en vragen, maar ook tot concrete adviezen en aanbevelingen.
Het UvT-onderzoek speelt zich af binnen de graduate schools van de faculteiten of binnen een van de vele onderzoeksinstituten. Elk instituut is gespecialiseerd in een of meer kennisgebieden; er zijn facultaire en multidisciplinaire instituten. In die laatste werken specialisten vanuit verschillende invalshoeken samen. Altijd met het oog op innovatieve wetenschap.
profile_positions.title: Scientific Behaviour Researcher

volunteer_experiences.description:
The Lions motto of all activities is: "We Serve." With this in mind Lions tries to find solutions for problems in society. 
Lions Quatro Breda does this as well and has a focus on children from Breda and its immediate surroundings.

Lions meet the needs of our local communities and the world. Our 1.3 million men and women in 205 countries and geographic areas conduct vision and health screenings, build parks, support eye hospitals, award scholarships, assist youth, provide help in time of disaster and much more. 

Whenever a Lions club gets together, problems get smaller. And communities get better. That's because we help where help is needed – in our own communities and around the world – with unmatched integrity and energy.

Our 46,000 clubs and 1.35 million members make us the world's largest service club organization. We're also one of the most effective. Our members do whatever is needed to help their local communities. Everywhere we work, we make friends. With children who need eyeglasses, with seniors who don’t have enough to eat and with people we may never meet.

Specialties
The global leader in community service., Volunteer opportunities, Sight services, World hunger relief programs

Vision Statement 
To be the global leader in community and humanitarian service. 

Mission Statement 
To empower volunteers to serve their communities, meet humanitarian needs, encourage peace and promote international understanding through Lions clubs.

http://www.lionsclubs.org/
http://www.lionsquatrobreda.nl/

By giving school materials and clothing to poor children we fulfill their basic needs and support their development. That way they are able to enjoy life and reach their potential. Besides that, schools are now able to offer the (overcrowded) classes an environment that the children desirve.

Our Vision: 
The suburban population in Brazil, especially women and little children, have limited opportunities to improve their quality of life. The main cause is a lack of access to employability and education. Besides that they are confronted with a lack of safety and health care. 
Our Mission: 
Contribute to the cultural, social, political and personal development of women, children and youngsters who live in this community.
Increase sustainability of nature & health of people
